suppress.notes: CVE-2018-1258 we do not use Spring Method Security, so this does not affect us. see https://pivotal.io/security/cve-2018-1258. we are on latest Spring Framework version : 5.2.2.RELEASE : https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-framework/wiki/Spring-Framework-Versions This is confirmed as false positive and hence it is suppressed (https://github.com/jeremylong/DependencyCheck/issues/2952)
CVE-2021-33037: Upgrade of tomcat-embed-websocket and tomcat-embed-core causing HttpServletResponse not found error
